about_the_game:
A long time ago a story was told to a certain village. The story of a sword so powerful it could destroy the world. Passed down to generation after generation the story seemed just a legend. That is, until evil started gaining power throughout the land. Now that evil has found it's way to your village you must rise up, find the sword, and save the village. On your quest to find the sword you must travel far and wide, face many terrifying enemies, equip yourself with powerful weapons and abilities.

Find and equip many different weapons to help you defeat powerful enemies, as you traverse the world in search of the sword of legend. Finding your way through each world will require you to find power ups and abilities that enable you to jump high, dash over treacherous terrain, and climb the steepest mountains.

You will be able to reach checkpoints and save your time playing as you make your journey.

Demo Game:

  • First 5 Levels
  • 1 Boss Battle
  • 2 Weapons
  • 1 Ability
